xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 27 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 03:32 <qwebirc15871> has joined #ccm 05:30 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 07:26 <krinye> has joined #ccm 08:12 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 08:39 <sdumitriu> Hey ravigarg27 08:40 <ravigarg27> Hi 08:40 <sdumitriu> Feeling lucky? 08:40 <ravigarg27> well 27 has always been lucky for me 08:40 <ravigarg27> :P 10:16 <krinye> has joined #ccm 10:17 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 10:24 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 10:55 <krinye> hi guys 11:06 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 11:07 <sdumitriu1> Hi krinye 12:11 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:24 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:27 <sdumitriu1> Hey ravigarg27 13:27 <sdumitriu1> Want to improve even more the similarity function? 13:27 <ravigarg27> yeah sure 13:28 <sdumitriu1> OK, this time I won't give you any hints, you have to find the solution yourself 13:28 <ravigarg27> yeah ok 13:28 <sdumitriu1> The goal is to support matches even if the words are reversed 13:29 <sdumitriu1> For example right now it matches "Mental retardation" to the equivalent synonym for Intellectual Disability 13:29 <sdumitriu1> But it should also match "Retardation, mental" to the same synonym 13:30 <ravigarg27> ok got that 13:30 <ravigarg27> will start soon 13:30 <sdumitriu1> So, the new scoring method should ignore puctuation, and it should support swapping words 13:30 <sdumitriu1> How do you do that? 13:31 <ravigarg27> umm will have to think about that 14:07 <ravigarg27> hey sdumitrui1, may I ask how many actually did got selected? 14:14 <sdumitriu1> ravigarg27: 5 14:15 <ravigarg27> ok nice substantial increase in slots :) 14:16 <ravigarg27> but still very limited activity here as you had told 14:16 <sdumitriu1> Yes... 14:17 <sdumitriu1> If students aren't active in the Community Bonding period we can easily drop them 14:19 <sdumitriu1> So, just a few minutes left 14:20 <sdumitriu1> What do you think? Did you get accepted? 14:21 <ravigarg27> I am certainly hoping so 14:22 <ravigarg27> but there is one thing certain even if I dont I will still go ahead with the project 14:22 <ravigarg27> I have learnt a lot in this build and want to keep learning 14:22 <ravigarg27> :) 14:23 <sdumitriu1> Oh, now you're saying... 14:24 <ravigarg27> does that mean I am in :P 14:24 <sdumitriu1> No, that's a secret 14:24 <sdumitriu1> And you're not allowed to know it 14:25 <ravigarg27> come on 33 minutes more I guess 14:35 <ravigarg27> hey also I was wondering if we can use tf-idf scoring along with the present algorithm to find the best match 14:36 <sdumitriu1> For matching synonyms? 14:36 <ravigarg27> yeah will that be feasible 14:36 <sdumitriu1> I think that's a bit too much 14:37 <sdumitriu1> We could, in theory, just ask Solr to tell us what matched, but that's a bit harder now, it requires reconfiguring the Solr core 14:37 <ravigarg27> ohh ok 14:53 <ravigarg27> woohooo 14:53 <ravigarg27> got the mail 14:53 <ravigarg27> :D 14:53 <ravigarg27> thanx sdumitrui1 14:54 <ravigarg27> happiest day of my life till now 14:54 <ravigarg27> :) 14:54 <sdumitriu1> What, already? 14:54 <ravigarg27> yup 14:54 <sdumitriu1> Congratulations! 14:54 <ravigarg27> :D :D 14:54 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 14:55 <BogdanVancea> hello everyone :) 14:55 <sdumitriu1> Hey BogdanVancea 14:55 <ravigarg27> thanx a lot captian 14:55 <sdumitriu1> Congratulations 14:55 <BogdanVancea> thanks :D 14:55 <BogdanVancea> so happy :D 14:55 <ravigarg27> congrats BogdanVancea :) 14:55 <marta> congrats guys :) 14:55 <BogdanVancea> grats ravi 14:56 <BogdanVancea> congrats to you too! :D 14:56 <ravigarg27> thanx mate :) 14:58 <BogdanVancea> how is everyone? :) 14:58 <sdumitriu1> Busy writing emails 14:58 <BogdanVancea> I see 14:59 <ravigarg27> marta, thank you very much for your support and guidance 14:59 <ravigarg27> :D 14:59 <marta> it was my pleasure, and we'll be talking a lot more from now on 15:00 <ravigarg27> hehe sure 15:00 <marta> long scary email with instructions coming soon :) 15:00 <BogdanVancea> I'm going to receive one of those as well, right? 15:00 <BogdanVancea> ;)) 15:01 <marta> just joking, it's not that long 15:01 <ravigarg27> hehe 15:01 <marta> BogdanVancea: yep, you too 15:02 <BogdanVancea> yay 19:20 <marta> has joined #ccm 19:36 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 21:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm
